title: Precise control of process parameters for >23% efficiency perovskite solar cells in ambient air using an automated device acceleration platform
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01432D, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Jiyun Zhang, Jianchang Wu, Anastasia Barabash, Tian Du, Shudi Qiu, Vincent M. Le Corre, Yicheng Zhao, Kaicheng Zhang, Frederik Schmitt, Zijian Peng, Jingjing Tian, Chaohui Li, Chao Liu, Thomas Heumueller, Larry Lüer, Jens A. Hauch, Christoph J. Brabec
Using a fully automated device acceleration platform (DAP) to systematically optimize air-processed parameters and establish a standard operation procedure (SOP) for preparing high-performance perovskite solar cells under ambient air.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
